Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory507.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If we can't defend this place, we'll be exposed to their attacks unprotected.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll leave the rest to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Got it. We're all going to survive this.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'How long has it been since she made that promise?'}
{3: 'Now, they are trapped inside this church, a sanctum that should be protected by the gods, and all they can hear is the sound of the Hetero-Creatures surrounding them.'}
{3: 'She knows her companions are nearby, but she cannot move an inch from all the Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures blocking her way.'}
{3: 'She tries to call for her companion, but the transmissions only return disjointed words and white noise.'}
{3: 'Perhaps it is true that sometimes prayers do not get answered in this world.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz103.png'}
{3: 'In a brief moment of trance, Lucia recalls the place that sent her down the path of becoming a Construct.'}
{3: 'Children cluster together, cold and hungry, lying and hurting each other for their survival.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory507.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That... was also a church...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lost her last family at a church. Is she going to fall at a place like it as well?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This... isn't the end...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Supporting herself with her katana, Lucia struggles as she moves forward.'}
{3: 'Her will is still defiant, but her frame can no longer support the fight that has lasted over ten days.'}
{3: 'It is time to face the truthâ€”perhaps this is the end of the line.'}
{3: 'Did they make the wrong choice?'}
{3: 'Should they have followed Liv back no matter what?'}
{3: 'More people would have been lost if they had not stayed.'}
{3: 'That is not something she, or anyone from Gray Raven, would want to see.'}
{3: 'Captain Chrome has not complained about the harsh battles once in the last ten days. He never regrets his choices because of what he is going through.'}
{3: 'How would Captain Vera from Cerberus act?'}
{3: 'Vera would look reluctant, but the truth is she would not stop fighting, Lucia thinks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera was casually talking about her previous rescue missions on the transport craft back from Atlantis with the commandant.'}
{3: 'Once, Vera found herself at a place where search and rescue equipment was not operable, but a sheepdog by her side helped her find the target.'}
{3: 'It was because of that story that Lucia and Liv managed to find the pregnant Fantine at the ruins with the help of Matches.'}
{3: 'As Lucia fights the endless horde of Hetero-Creatures, fragments of her memories flash by her M.I.N.D. like a merry-go-round.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory507.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'None of us... wishes to see another life lost...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The other teams might not be here, but Lucia believes that every one of them would have made the same choice.'}
{3: 'Even Vanessa, whose whereabouts are unknown, has chosen this path not long ago.'}
{3: 'Each of them has someone or something they want to protect, and each of them has fought until their very last breath.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We do not regret...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But the world is not merciful.'}
{3: 'Cutting down the enemies before her, Lucia looks around at the more Hetero-Creatures yet to come.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Her frame is pushed to the brink, her Inver-Device at the threshold. Lucia estimates that she has ten minutes before she stops moving.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I won't stop even if I only have ten minutes left.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her belief will be with her until her last moment.'}
{3: 'As if her determination is being rewarded, she hears a voice on the Gray Raven comms channel, one that she has not heard in a while.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia!'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What's happening? Why can't I see you on comms? Where's Lee? Why couldn't I contact you before?"}
{3: 'The monitor on the comms is not showing anything. Lucia cannot see Liv, and Liv cannot see her.'}
{3: "That is because the moment she hears Liv's voice, Lucia immediately covers the terminal. She does not want Liv to see her like this."}
{3: "And maybe Lucia's terminal was damaged during the battles, so she cannot see Liv on it as well."}
{3: 'But that is fine. Despite not being able to see Liv, it is good enough to hear her voice in the end, Lucia thinks.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you still on Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm on a transport craft to you. I'll be there soon."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, don't come here. It's too dangerous.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia? What's going on? Why is it dangerous?"}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's okay, you don't have to worry about me. Do you remember the weapon President Hassen mentioned before I left? It's done."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It doesn't matter how dangerous it is. I can protect you."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...I can do it now, Lucia! Please, believe me!'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...How long until you reach us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It... should take another hour.'}
{3: '...It is too late.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What's wrong? Why aren't you saying anything?"}
{3: "If she cannot change the ending, then at least she can go accompanied by Liv's gentle voice."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Can I hear you sing one more time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What? Lucia... why are you...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Think of it as a countdown. I'll feel more assured if I can hear your voice when I fight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "When your song is close by, I'll know you're near.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And Liv... sing it to Commandant someday, okay?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Has she realized the situation Lucia is in? Lucia can hear her gentle voice shaking.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm sorry... it's untoward to ask you to sing mid-flight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...It's the only thing I can do before I reach you."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Let me stand by you this way.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But you have to promise me that you will keep yourself safe and never give up.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hold on until I get there. I will be able to help.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You have always been able to help, Liv.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In order to keep Liv from being more worried, Lucia tries her best to chuckle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then... I'll be waiting for you here.", 4: '1'}
